start.description: OK, so you want to get off of this website. First, let's see if you're on it. Go to PeopleSmart.com and look for yourself

removeyourself.description: Go to PeopleSmart.com opt out and opt out

nextSteps.prompt: It didn't work, I'll come back to this later

action.tweet: I got a merit badge protecting my identity! pic.twitter.com/9VXkpZNclf Check out http://cutealism.com/fight

aww.description: Maybe come back and try to take yourself off the site some other time.
